text: The Mayor shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this subchapter.
historical:
Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 19-171 validated a previously made technical correction.

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 17-281, see notes following § 8-1841.01.

For history of Law 19-171, see notes under § 8-105.02.
